website_summaries.verdict: Denim material looks great on your cat, while remaining easy to wash. Seems to fit tighter than some Velcro harnesses, preventing escape.
pros: Cat vest is easy to take off and put on
If you choose the right size, the vest fits tightly enough that owners say cats cannot escape
cons: Owners report some cats don't like the feel of the fabric
Can be difficult to order just the right size for your cat

customer_reviews.title: PURRFECT
customer_reviews.text: My babe, Felix, needed a harness. Found this one and immediately got it so I could turn it into a punk vest. By far the best flipping thing I've ever done. Felix loves it, it's comfortable, and he's only 5 months (babyyyy) so it's got a perfect amount of growing room. MAJOR BONUS: he looks like a badass while he torments my roommate's cat.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: The Cat's Meow
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it! My little girl cat hasn't flipped out and gotten herself out of it like she did another harness I tried. (Disaster.) I think this one is much sturdier even though it's got Velcro. Having said that, we've only been out with a few times. I'm hoping she can't get out of this one, but we'll see. I was very glad for the size chart and instructions - it fits perfectly. It's also ridiculously cute. The tiny pockets are functional! I just thought they'd be decorative. It's not like I'll cut anything in it - it would maybe fit a dime! - but it's a really nice little feature. Maybe I'll try to post lics later.
customer_reviews.author: QueenBee

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: My mister cat is so handsome in it and to test the Velcro strength, I was able to lift my 13 pound cat off of the ground by just by holding the vest! It’s so cute and functional. I got nervous with the Velcro at first and especially becuase when I took my cat outside and he got overwhelmed, he began to pull away from me, wanting to bolt, but it held him, and he’s a really strong boy!
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: This was a cute idea... and I ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a cute idea... and I took my cat out with it a few times....he did well on it... but something scared him and he was able to get out of it. Luckily he is a very laid back cat and I was able to catch him.. I am scared to use this again :(
customer_reviews.author: pat cruzan

customer_reviews.title: It fits!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered using the guidelines of previous buyers for sizing. Works beautifully--Blobafur can't get out of it! And he's a regular Houdini with every other harness we've had him in (cat has a wardrobe of them!) Not to mention the thing is cute as bugs. Our cat is 16# and kind of long, but the size M is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Muro

customer_reviews.title: my cats will be safe and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Our cats never wear harnesses but we are moving to another state and I wanted to take every precaution not to lose either of them. Both cats are small but these soft, well constructed cloth harnesses stay put and did not bother either cat. I was looking for reliable function rather than "cutsey" and these give me just that. Also like that a leash comes with each harness and they are very easy to put on my cats. Wish us luck with our move!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Liberace

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this harness. It is adorable, and secure. It took my cat a few days to get comfortable but now we spend our afternoons lounging on my balcony and I don't have to worry about her jumping or falling off. I ordered a medium, she is a tall 10 pounds. She probably could have fit in a small, the neck strap has a little wiggle room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it's the Velcro or just being dressed, but my cat HATES this. I tried to ease her into it but to no avail. That said, it is easy to put on, super cute, and it didn't seem like she'd be able to get out of it (she doesn't even try, just crouched and hissed each time, but the Velcro is good quality). I think I'll need to get one with less fabric but would definitely recommend for a more easy-going cat.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Toughest Meow On The Block
customer_reviews.text: Listen to me right meow... this denim vest is the best. Queso is now the toughest cat on our block. The other cats all respect her and envy her ability to go out into the yard. The Velcro holds well for her, she’s lunged at birds once or twice and it’s held, which was a concern for me. Queso used to be a feral cat so her desire to be outdoors is strong. I’ve rexommended this to a lot of friends so that their little meows can be outside too!
customer_reviews.author: Nix Muse

customer_reviews.title: Overall, nice & lightweight harness
customer_reviews.text: This little harness is absolutely adorable, and I love how it has actual little pockets on the back. Half of the stitching on the chest Velcro was gone, so I just sewed it myself, no biggie. Even thought this harness is very small, my kitten is petite, so I just sewed on snaps to the neck and chest and that works great! I also customized it as well. The material isn’t too thick which made it easier to sew things on. And it doesn’t seem like it’ll be too terribly hot because it’s pretty lightweight. Overall, we are very happy with how this harness turned out, and our little princess looks like a movie star 🤩
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: 14 year old cat liked it
customer_reviews.text: Tigger adapted immediately to this harness. Doesn’t bother him a bit. Purchased because we’ve begun taking him to our vacation condo. He’s an indoor cat who would like to go outside and occasionally at home gets out. Traffic and occasional fox/hawk visits to our yard makes it unsafe for him to roam. Now we just have to figure out our 2-3 hour road trip “bathroom” needs 🙀 He’s a big cat weighing almost 20 lbs, 20” long, smaller front half. I wasn’t sure about the size to order but seems fine unless the leash is in front of him when he walks then it looks a little iffy.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Small was great fit for my kitten
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5 month Exotic kitten who’s 5 lbs and wasn’t sure what size (XS or S). I chose the small and it fits perfectly! Still roomy but secure. I love the denim vest look and can’t wait to customize it with a few patches! Hahaha It works great with the Devoted Doggy car booster seat tether as well.
customer_reviews.author: Deidre

customer_reviews.title: Great Harness!
customer_reviews.text: It worked for my cat quite well. He is an escape artist and I think those cats who escape might not be in the right size. I like the look as well. I don't dress up my cat but the homage to James Dean is fun. I have found that this type of harness works better than other styles.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Pryor

customer_reviews.title: Harness is well made and works good.
customer_reviews.text: My little girl kitten really likes going outside now. This jacket is well built and seems to do a good job of holding onto kitten without hurting them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael John

customer_reviews.title: Great, adjustable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Eaaasy to put on, velcro and sturdy. Olive is anti sleeves, she likes to show off her thick arms. this took me a second to put on her so perfect for me! And its a harness so came with a nice matching leash :D Love it! And Olive looks great lots of compliments Olive is 9.7 pounds, got M
customer_reviews.author: OliveNait

customer_reviews.title: Company was great on refunding me
customer_reviews.text: It was small for my regular size cat, plus it had velcro strips to fasten and one big pull and he was loosening them. Cute look though. Company was great on refunding me.
customer_reviews.author: nycdgs44

customer_reviews.title: So cute and kitten approved!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3 month old male kitten who is growing like a weed but ordered the extra small based off the size chart and it’s really big on him which is fine because he will grow into it. He actually doesn’t mind it at all and still ran around and played with it on him. I bought a 15 ft nylon rope leash to let him wander the back yard without getting loose. I was really worried this would fall right off of him but it stayed on just fine. It is a soft product and is so stinking cute. I will order another one once he outgrows his xsmall.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 3lb yorkie
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 harnesses to take my tiny furbaby on walks that ALl slipped off before finding this one. It fits her perfectly an is well made. She looks very stylish in it so that’s an added bonus! She’s exactly 3 lbs if this helps anyone.
customer_reviews.author: NatureLoving_furmom

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than described
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an XS. It said it was for a cat with measurements of 9.5” for the neck, and 13-14” for the chest. It actually measured 7” at the neck and 10” at the chest.
customer_reviews.author: K.E.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy, not escape proof
customer_reviews.text: Really fun and cute. She loves wearing it out. However, with a fast lunge she can escape it as it is velcro. I recommend using it over a more secure harness if you worry about your kitty running.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Marie Beucler

customer_reviews.title: Not very secure, but very fashionable
customer_reviews.text: Used to make a battle vest for my cat. Works well for dress up but just okay as a harness. If I safety pin the collar closed it's fine. Velcro really should be on the top side instead of the bottom, it has a tendency to open if kitty tugs to hard. Fortunately I have a calm cat that just sits next to me if he escapes, but this design could be disasterous for some cats.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: and be able to lay down comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This was a cute idea for something different for my travel cat, but two things I don't care for: First it isn't blue. Almost a beige color. So the "blue jean" idea is lost. Second the silver buttons are actually heavy rivets that are on the inside too. They lay right on the spine causing my cat to sway his back, which he doesn't do in his other harnesses. I have the kitty holster harnesses which are only cloth, no hardware. So I will have to pad the rivets somehow so he will walk normally, and be able to lay down comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C Beatty

customer_reviews.title: Adorable harness, triple check your sizing!
customer_reviews.text: Cat in a jean jacket?! Yes please! I bought a size Medium for my girl. Absolutely adorable and seemingly durable, she was unfortunately able to slip out of that size after a few minutes. When I attempted to replace the item for a Small, there was miscommunication and I was sent another Medium with an adorable free gift - a rainbow collar with a bell. What a nice gesture! We will be triple-checking our measurements next time!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Bad Boy
customer_reviews.text: Just the thing for my masculine male kitty. He doesn't feel the free roaming cats in the neighbourhood are making fun of him for wearing a harness any more Because he's bad to the bone in his denim attire. Fits snugly with no wriggle out room.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Zanne

customer_reviews.title: velcro closings would not hold a cat
customer_reviews.text: The harness is nicely made and easy to put on but when my cat pulls velcro tabs open at once. Only safe for a placid cat under constant supervision.
customer_reviews.author: Oksana Klueva

customer_reviews.title: Stated measurements way off!
customer_reviews.text: The jacket itself was very cute. It fit perfect around my cats neck, but wouldn't even go around his chest. Err on the side of caution and order a size up. Sadly I had to return the item. Not sure if I will order another as I'm afraid the neck will be too big..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cat is so hipster
customer_reviews.text: I bought so many harnesses for my cat after her favorite finally wore out. This was the one SHE picked. It’s an actual denim vest with Velcro closure, and she cries to put it on and go out. I was skeptical ordering it, but she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Minutola

customer_reviews.title: RUNS VERY SMALL
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute, I love it! HOWEVER, IT IS TINY! unfortunately none of my cats can wear this because it’s so small! I have two average size cats and one on the smaller size. If you order get a large!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R. Young

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I got this and bought some spikes and patches from the craft store and now my car looks like a biker.
customer_reviews.author: beverly russell

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool, fits pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It's honestly so cool looking and fits great. Our cat is overweight and it has so much adjustability it fits. The velcro is sturdy but with continual use will obviously wear away. Also, the neck portion is bulky. Still it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: April cluess

customer_reviews.title: My cats be styling' with their new walking gear!
customer_reviews.text: I have three cats and they love being taken for walks, however they tend to want to wander off and I am concerned they might get away from me without a harness. These harnesses are well made, cute and the cats love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Schepps

customer_reviews.title: She actually seems to enjoy wearing it strangely enough
customer_reviews.text: So cute! I have a regular sized adult cat (11 lbs) and she wears a size small. She actually seems to enjoy wearing it strangely enough
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute jacket for flopping over
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if this is really designed for cat. This is a cute Jacket but my cat can't walk and always flop over when wearing it. He is about 7 lb., the neck part is a little too big. Once he flopped on the ground, his arm can easily escape from the 'collar'. The body part is perfect. Trying to walk my cat with it but MISSION FAILED. :( Other than that, it is of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Wansu

customer_reviews.title: I love my punk kitten.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted my cat to be able to come with me to shows and help work the merch booth. I think she's ready lol
customer_reviews.author: YFC

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous for a cat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an iguana, however, he is not large enough yet. This is a great vest for a cat, it is stylish and very well made. It is really adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know how “secure” it is, but it’s cute af
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute- I let my jungle cat show off to her jungle cat friends and she came home without it! I will be buying another one. I didn’t wear it, but she didn’t complain about comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Township

customer_reviews.title: My cat adores her vest!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing! Very functional, my cat doesnt even notice it's on. The pockets are actual pockets too!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan g Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Customer review
customer_reviews.text: This definitely was cute on my cat but my cat turned stiff and fell over like cat sometimes do so I took it off.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: adorb
customer_reviews.text: this is the first clothing Naomi didn't hate! I haven't tried taking her on a walk in it yet, but shes pretty snug in there, and very comfortable wearing a close-fitted harness. I ordered the XS for her and I may add a little bit of extra velcro to the neck so it for sure won't slip off, but so far I'd say this is a win!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It is so cute, and easy to put on.. I’d definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: kaytill

customer_reviews.title: So cute...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughters kitty. It looks really good and is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Nice little jacket- but she'll have to grow into it
customer_reviews.text: XS was still too big for my 10 month old kitten, but it looks so nice on her. I'm hoping she'll grow into it. The waist part fits correctly, neck strap is far too loose and she quickly got the jacket off.
customer_reviews.author: Tera

customer_reviews.title: Cute!  Dog hates it.
customer_reviews.text: Adorable jacket but my dog will not wear it. He's a 5 pound Chihuahua and it just doesn't fit quite right. The front closure straps are really wide given the size of the garment and I think it's just too annoying for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: both my cats can easily slink out of the harness
customer_reviews.text: My cat is 9lbs and I ordered a size Small. I could have ordered an XS. Even so, both my cats can easily slink out of the harness. I also have another leash with a buckle and adjustable strap which is much more secure.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon E. Yee

customer_reviews.title: which is adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly, my cat loves this harness and going for walks in it. :) The little pockets are real, too, which is adorable!
customer_reviews.author: A.L.

customer_reviews.title: but my cat hated it.
customer_reviews.text: the harness was cute, but my cat hated it., She would only walk backward and roll over trying to get out of it.
customer_reviews.author: pat19439

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Our kitty can slip right out of this. Not happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: MissJan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is some product is great, well made fits great 4 different sizes and looks great. My cats don't mind wearing the vest and they look so cute in lt! I had contact with the supplier and they are so accommodating. If you looking for a vest for your cat or dog don't look any further!
customer_reviews.author: Martin Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Cute but...
customer_reviews.text: It looks great but my cat got out of it every. single. time.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Seems more comfortable then other leads we have used and is very cute. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: S.M.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The jacket did not fit my cat, but considering he's 3 months I don't blame the seller. I can't wait for him to grow so we can go for little strolls. The jacket is cute and the leash is surprisingly sturdy and long.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie A.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: My cat got it loose, but was hung up in it.
customer_reviews.author: MsDomina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cat not too uncomfortable in it, harness was miserable. Fits a little large.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 for our cats and am on to buy more for another 2 cats! They worked excellent for airline travel. They are well made, fit well and were an excellent product. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Northern Sky

customer_reviews.title: Jean jacket cat harness
customer_reviews.text: It's adorable and fits perfectly. Love the Velcro as it adjusts. Bought one for each cat.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Snowden

customer_reviews.title: Bad fit
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but I had to give it away to a friend for her small dog. This was too large for my cat and she had no issue wiggling her way out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela W Kraus

customer_reviews.title: Your call
customer_reviews.text: Product so stiff that neither of my cats moved. Not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella R Mackowiak

customer_reviews.title: seems to be of good quality. however
customer_reviews.text: fits as expected, seems to be of good quality. however, the color in the picture shows a light blue faded denim. the one we got was almost white...
customer_reviews.author: Corizi

customer_reviews.title: Bought wrong size it’s cute and extremely durable but it’s too big for my cat :/
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally bought the ring one idk how to get ahold of the sellers tho
customer_reviews.author: Elias Garza

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I do not like how the vest is expected to stay on with velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Krystin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's only a matter of time until he gets used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M. Colon

customer_reviews.title: Blue jean harness & leash
customer_reviews.text: I have to send back. My cat needs a large one. I think it looks cute on him, he's not such a fan of it.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Doherty

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the halter and leash. It’s easy to put on him and less restrictive than the other halter we had
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca P. Sydnor

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I love the harness, my cat likes the harness better than a collar
customer_reviews.author: mindi

customer_reviews.title: Cat won’t wear it.
customer_reviews.text: My cat won’t wear it, seems to find it very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Czerepak

customer_reviews.title: It's velcro, and my cat managed to get out ...
customer_reviews.text: It's velcro, and my cat managed to get out of this. Something with clips would be a lot more secure. You've been warned.
customer_reviews.author: de omnibus dubitandum est

customer_reviews.title: step out in style
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is cute and stylish, providing more coverage than a regular harness. My cats could not get out of it, but could have if they really tried. There is no adjustment available on the jacket, although the velcro fastener can be pulled tighter. This, however, makes the excess velcro stick out and might not hold the jacket closed very well. An improvement would be to make the jacket somewhat adjustable somewhere, but the jacket is lined and seams are not visible. But it is very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: It was very well made, cute, fit well, I used it for my kitten.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cats like these jackets
customer_reviews.text: The cats like these jackets. The small size was a bit loose for our smaller 9 lb cat but my wife sewed on some extra Velcro to allow the straps to tighten a bit more and now it works fine. The medium size was perfect for out 13 lb cat. The leash is a bit short, but it's easy to clip on a longer one.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Happy kitty mom
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely purrfect! My cat is used to harness and lead. We struggled to deal with the clip on harness. She would be excited and put her head in the wrong hole. The tiny clips were hard on my hands. This thing went right on! She was purrfectly fine immediately. Brilliant. Other brands are too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Zenmoments Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, but cat refuses to wear
customer_reviews.text: The vest is absolutely darling, but, unfortunately, my Main Coon cat is not as enchanted with it as I am :(
customer_reviews.author: Jane Howard

customer_reviews.title: easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: it supports without hurting the cat. easy to adjust, difficult for the cat to get out of it by himself!
customer_reviews.author: dayoung

customer_reviews.title: Works good but my cat back legs quit working when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Works good but my cat back legs quit working when I put it on. But that may be a good thing
customer_reviews.author: Blonde_Saint

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: It is not only cute.... but allows to easily dress my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Zule4ka

customer_reviews.title: This is super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, cat is about 15 lbs got a large. Came with a cute little collar with a bell and leash.
customer_reviews.author: Dasiey201

customer_reviews.title: My cat can go outside now!
customer_reviews.text: “Cinder” loves to look out the window so I got this cute vest with leash to see if he’d actually go outside. Yes, it works! The vest is so cute on him and surprisingly, he likes it. He goes outside with me and can’t run off now. The vest works very well. I like it and Cinder does too. 😃
customer_reviews.author: valerie

product_meta.title: Ruri's Cat Jeans Jacket Harness Vest with Matching Lead Leash Set
feature_bullets: Soft pet harness Can Be Pet & Kitty & Puppy Car Vehicle Seat Harness/Halloween Classics Collection Costume/Photo Apparel/ Holiday Wear/Clothes Party Coat.
Opening design is easy to put on and take off.
Best quality washable denim, faded effect has a textured feel.
PLEASE CHECK SIZE IMAGE ON THE LEFT. This Harness set have four size: S chest 13.5”-15”, To ensure the best fit, please measure your pet precisely with a flexible tape measure.
Made for Cats, Puppies and Small Sized Dogs.
